Welcome to NHS-R Community's information postcard!

No matter where you are in your journey in learning R you are welcome to use all and reuse our resources and these are a few links to [get started](https://nhsrcommunity.com/getting-started.html) or [get involved](https://nhsrcommunity.com/get-involved.html). 

If you want to get in touch with the community you will find us at Slack.

We hope to see you soon!
